item.title: 特朗普关税威胁加深 2,480 亿美元的印度股市暴跌
item.description: 在印度对美国的出口被征收亚洲最高的关税之后，印度摇摇欲坠的股票市场面临着更多损失的风险。【原文：India’s faltering equities market faces the risk of more losses after the nation was slapped with one of the highest tariff rates in Asia on its exports to the US.】

item.title: 大阪交易所将增加做市商的单一股票期权
item.description: 大阪交易所（Osaka Exchange Inc.【原文：Osaka Exchange Inc. plans to expand its market making program for single stock options amid efforts to increase derivatives trading in Japan.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行行长豪瑟称 CPI "非常受欢迎"，就业市场仍受争议
item.description: 澳大利亚储备银行副行长安德鲁-豪瑟（Andrew Hauser）表示，澳大利亚本周的季度通胀结果接近储备银行的预期，同时他补充说，储备银行正在讨论劳动力市场的紧张程度。【原文：Australia’s quarterly inflation outcome this week was close to the Reserve Bank’s expectations, Deputy Governor Andrew Hauser said, while adding the board is debating the extent of labor market tightness.】

item.title: 谁最有可能受到特朗普 25% 印度关税和惩罚的影响
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普从8月1日起对印度出口商品征收25%的关税，预计将对一系列行业造成损害，包括电子产品和非专利药品制造商、珠宝和汽车零部件公司。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s 25% tariff on Indian exports from Aug. 1 is expected to hurt a spate of sectors — from makers of electronics and generic drugs to jewelry and auto component firms.】

item.title: 百威啤酒亚太区利润不及预期，中国经济放缓对其造成影响
item.description: 百威啤酒亚太有限公司（Budweiser Brewing Co APAC Ltd. ）第二季度利润低于预期，原因是中国消费持续疲软，啤酒消费量继续下降。【原文：Budweiser Brewing Co APAC Ltd.’s second-quarter profit fell short of expectations, as beer consumption in China continued to decline as the country sees persistent consumer weakness.】

item.title: 与美国达成 15%关税协议后韩国股市和韩元反弹
item.description: 在亚洲国家与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普达成贸易协议，对韩国出口美国的商品征收 15%的关税后，韩国股市走高。韩元兑美元汇率攀升。【原文：South Korean equities advanced after the Asian nation clinched a trade deal with President Donald Trump that would impose a 15% tariff on its exports to the US. The won climbed against the dollar.】

item.title: 特朗普关税将精炼金属排除在外后伦敦铜价上涨
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布美国对精炼金属免征进口关税，令市场感到震惊，此后伦敦铜价走高。【原文：Copper edged higher in London after President Donald Trump shocked the market by exempting refined metal from US import tariffs.】

item.title: 日本工厂产出增长显示企业在关税影响下的韧性
item.description: 日本 6 月份的工厂产出出人意料地增长，因为即使美国的关税对日本的出口造成了压力，制造商们仍然表现出了韧性。【原文：Japan’s factory output unexpectedly rose in June, as manufacturers showed resilience even as US tariffs weigh on the nation’s exports.】

item.title: 关税担忧加剧，台币远期汇率将回落
item.description: 由于贸易紧张局势加剧说服海外投资者削减对岛内股票的购买，对冲需求减少，一种受欢迎的台币衍生品开始回吐近期的部分涨幅。【原文：A popular Taiwan dollar derivative is starting to unwind some of its recent gains as rising trade tensions convince overseas investors to cut purchases of the island’s stocks and reduce demand for hedging.】

item.title: 三星芯片部门大幅亏损，显示危机扩大
item.description: 三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd.）半导体部门报告的利润远低于预期，反映出这家全球最大的存储芯片制造商的危机正在加深。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co.’s semiconductor division reported profit that fell far short of expectations, reflecting a deepening crisis at the world’s largest memory chipmaker.】

item.title: 美国瞄准俄罗斯和伊朗贸易，石油维持六周高位
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁要惩罚购买俄罗斯原油的印度，而且他的政府加强了对伊朗原油供应的打压，石油在收于近六周来的最高点后趋于稳定。【原文：Oil steadied after closing at the highest in almost six weeks as President Donald Trump threatened to penalize India for buying Russian crude and his administration tightened a crackdown on supplies from Iran.】

item.title: 关税最后期限临近，特朗普与墨西哥谢因鲍姆计划通话
item.description: 据熟悉计划的人士透露，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和墨西哥总统克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆计划于周四上午通电话，因为周五是避免30%关税的最后期限，而美国与其最大的贸易伙伴之间尚未达成协议。【原文：President Donald Trump and his Mexican counterpart Claudia Sheinbaum plan to speak by phone on Thursday morning, according to people familiar with the plans, as a Friday deadline to avoid a 30% tariff nears with no agreement between the US and its largest trade partner.】

item.title: 巴拿马官员要求法院审查和记黄埔港口合同
item.description: 巴拿马总审计长要求最高法院审查政府与长江和记控股有限公司（CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd.）旗下一家公司的续约合同，这可能会给该公司出售业务的交易带来新的麻烦。【原文：Panama’s comptroller general asked the Supreme Court to review the government’s contract extension with a unit of CK Hutchison Holdings Ltd., potentially throwing a new wrench in the company’s deal to sell the business.】

item.title: 分析师称亚洲外汇市场将因美联储信号影响股市波动而下跌
item.description: 据分析师和策略师称，在美联储维持利率不变并明确表示即将降息后，亚洲货币似乎将走软，而股市可能会出现波动。【原文：Asian currencies look set to weaken, while equities may fluctuate, after the Federal Reserve held interest rates and steered clear of signaling imminent cuts, according to analysts and strategists.】

item.title: 香港稳定币制度将在美国之后启动
item.description: 为应对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）煽动与美元挂钩的代币增长的竞选活动，亚洲当局加大了监管力度，一套管理香港稳定币发行商的新规则将于周五生效。【原文：A new set of rules governing stablecoin issuers in Hong Kong takes effect on Friday as Asian authorities step up regulatory efforts in response to President Donald Trump’s campaign to stoke the growth of tokens pegged to the US dollar.】

item.title: JD.com 提议收购 Ceconomy，交易估值 22 亿欧元
item.description: 中国电子商务公司 JD.com Inc. 提出收购 Ceconomy AG，交易价值约为 22 亿欧元（25 亿美元）。【原文：Chinese e-commerce firm JD.com Inc. offered to acquire Ceconomy AG in a deal that would value the German electronics retailer at about €2.2 billion ($2.5 billion).】

item.title: 盈利超预期，微软市值将达 4 万亿美元
item.description: 微软公司（Microsoft Corp. ）公布的季度财报超出华尔街预期，将成为全球第二家市值达到 4 万亿美元的公司。【原文：Microsoft Corp. is set to become the second company in the world to reach a $4 trillion market capitalization after reporting quarterly earnings that beat Wall Street’s expectations, sending the stock soaring in extended trading Wednesday.】

item.title: 鲍威尔顶住压力，在通胀问题上表现出不同决心
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）回避了来自白宫的压力，拒绝了两位持反对意见的官员要求降息的论点，坚持认为央行需要时刻警惕通胀风险。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell shrugged off pressure from the White House and rejected arguments for an interest-rate cut from two dissenting officials, maintaining that the central bank needed to stay on guard against inflation risk.】

item.title: 特朗普出人意料地征收铜关税，美国巨大库存成为焦点
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）今年 2 月发出关税电报，掀起了大规模铜矿流入美国港口的浪潮。现在，这位美国总统可能已经开始逆转这一利润丰厚的贸易。【原文：Donald Trump kicked off a massive movement of copper into American ports by telegraphing tariffs in February. Now the US president may have initiated the reversal of what’s been a hugely profitable trade.】

item.title: 市场综述：美联储按兵不动，科技股冲击美国期货，美元走强
item.description: 在华尔街表现平平之后，美国股票期货因强劲的科技股收益而上涨。美联储维持利率不变，削弱了国债，亚洲股票期货涨跌不一。【原文：US equity futures rose on robust tech earnings after a flat session on Wall Street. The Federal Reserve held interest rates, weakening Treasuries and leaving Asian equity futures mixed.】

item.title: 市场综述：美联储按兵不动，科技股冲击美国期货，美元走强
item.description: 在华尔街表现平平之后，美国股票期货因强劲的科技股收益而上涨。美联储维持利率不变，削弱了国债，亚洲股票期货涨跌不一。【原文：US equity futures rose on robust tech earnings after a flat session on Wall Street. The Federal Reserve held interest rates, weakening Treasuries and leaving Asian equity futures mixed.】

item.title: 特朗普称美国将对韩国商品征收 15%的关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他与韩国达成了一项贸易协议，将对韩国出口到美国的商品征收15%的关税，并同意首尔向美国投资3500亿美元。【原文：President Donald Trump said he reached a trade deal with South Korea that would impose a 15% tariff on its exports to the US and see Seoul agree to $350 billion in US investments.】

item.title: 艾伯维洽谈以 10 亿美元收购吉尔伽美什公司
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，艾伯维公司（AbbVie Inc.【原文：AbbVie Inc. is in talks to acquire mental health therapeutics company Gilgamesh Pharmaceuticals in a deal highlighting growing takeover interest in the sector, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: FuriosaAI 融资 1.25 亿美元，力争成为英伟达的挑战者
item.description: 位于首尔的半导体初创公司 FuriosaAI Inc.试图挑战 Nvidia 公司，该公司在一轮融资中获得了 1.25 亿美元，以加速其人工智能芯片的生产。【原文：FuriosaAI Inc., the Seoul-based semiconductor startup seeking to challenge Nvidia Corp., secured $125 million in a financing round to accelerate production of its artificial intelligence chip.】

item.title: Figma 首次公开募股定价预计将高于区间，每股 33 美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Figma Inc. 的美国首次公开募股价格预计为每股 33 美元，高于这家设计与协作软件公司上调后的价格区间。【原文：Figma Inc. is expected to price its US initial public offering at $33 per share, according to people familiar with the matter, above the design and collaboration software company’s increased price range.】

item.title: 巴西因通胀高企和关税不确定性将利率维持在 15
item.description: 就在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）推迟实施惩罚性关税数小时后，巴西央行维持其关键利率不变，暂停货币紧缩周期，以观察其对超目标通胀率的影响。【原文：Brazil’s central bank held its key interest rate unchanged, pausing a monetary tightening cycle to observe its effects on above-target inflation just hours after Donald Trump delayed the implementation of punishing tariffs.】

item.title: 一位 "年度企业家 "如何带来人工智能蓬勃发展的第一次大萧条
item.description:
Sachin Dev Duggal 帮助 Builder.ai 达到了 15 亿美元的估值。随后，由于被指控虚增收入，董事会将他赶下台，这家初创公司申请破产。【原文：

Sachin Dev Duggal helped Builder.ai reach a $1.5 billion valuation. Then its board ousted him amid allegations of inflated revenue and the startup filed for bankruptcy.

】

item.title: 韩国私募股权基金面临拟议法案带来的风险
item.description: 韩国执政党的一位立法者提出了一项法案，以提高私募股权基金的信息披露要求，从而使加强对该行业监管的呼声日益高涨。【原文：A South Korean lawmaker in the ruling party has proposed a bill to heighten disclosure requirements for private equity funds, adding to growing calls for tighter oversight of the industry.】

item.title: 微软首次公布 Azure 云销售额为 750 亿美元
item.description: 微软公司表示，其 Azure 云计算部门在 2025 财年创造了超过 750 亿美元的收入，这是该公司首次为其花费十多年时间打造的一项重要业务提供美元数字。【原文：Microsoft Corp. said its Azure cloud-computing unit generated more than $75 billion during the 2025 fiscal year, the first time the company has put a dollar figure on a critical business it has spent more than a decade building.】

item.title: 丰业银行资本市场部首席运营官萨拉-帕特尔（Sarah Patel）因个人原因离职
item.description: 丰业银行资本市场部首席运营官 Sarah Patel 因个人原因离职。【原文：Bank of Nova Scotia’s Sarah Patel, chief operating officer of its capital-markets division, is leaving the firm for personal reasons.】
